text: @FLOTUS Please put the Active Herd Immunity (AHI) strategy in your reopening plan.  see  https://t.co/P7VecxqSvs.  It is a powerful tool to control the outbreak, allow smooth transition back to normal!!  And this is great tool for poor countries to defend against the Covid19 as well.
